data: `minecraft:behavior.find_mount` allows an entity to find another entity to mount.

data.Name: avoid_water
data.Description: If true, the mob will not go into water blocks when going towards a mount

data.Name: mount_distance
data.Description: This is the distance the mob needs to be, in blocks, from the desired mount to mount it. If the value is below 0, the mob will use its default attack distance

data.Name: start_delay
data.Description: Time the mob will wait before starting to move towards the mount

data.Name: target_needed
data.Description: If true, the mob will only look for a mount if it has a target

data.Name: within_radius
data.Description: Distance in blocks within which the mob will look for a mount
